revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Acme Systems |model=Fox Board G20 |revision=V1 |manuf_country=Italy |is_manuf=No |availability=Long Term Availability |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |pwr_barrel_len=0.9 |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM9G20 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=256 KiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT45DB021D |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=K4M51323PI-HG75 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161AEP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Programmable Dual High-Current Step-Down DC/DC and Dual Linear Regulator;TI;LM26480;;1;,,, 4 Pin Push-Pull Voltage Supervisor w/Manual Reset;ON Semi;CAT811;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, UART, GPIO, I2C, SPI |stock_boot=AcmeBoot;1.22; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.209;Debian 10; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=acme |default_pass=acmesystems |oui_eth=00:04:25 }} {{TagLine|FOX Board G20}} :[https://www.acmesystems.it/FOXG20 Product page]
Device is the [[Acme Systems Netus G20]] SoM mounted :on a carrier board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' AT91SAM9G20 :@400MHz (ARM926EJ-S) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) SDR *Storage: 256KB SPI NOR Flash, :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x Micro USB Device *Power Source: 5V 1A via barrel or Berg Connector
==Images== <gallery> File:Netus G20 Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:Netus G20 Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom File:Fox Carrier Board Top.jpeg|Carrier Board Top File:Fox Carrier Board Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Board Bottom File:Fox Board Top.jpeg|Fox Board Top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
